text: Edward Meller (c. 1647 – buried 1699), of Little Bredy, Dorset, was an English politician. ==Family== He was the maternal grandson of MP, Owen Jennens. ==Career== He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Dorchester in 1685.http://www.historyofparliamentonline.org/volume/1660-1690/member/meller- edward-1647-99 ==References== Category:1647 births Category:1699 deaths Category:English MPs 1685–1687 Category:Members of the Parliament of England for Dorchester Category:People from Dorset
title: Edward Meller
